```{r init, echo=TRUE}
library(boerseDuesseldorf)
destdir_provider <- "../inst/extdata/provider"
```

```{r download_fg, eval=FALSE}
## modes <- c("a", "b")
modes <- c("1", letters)
unlink(file.path(destdir_provider, "*"))
getFG(modes = modes, destdir = destdir_provider)
```

```{r extract_fg, eval=TRUE, results="as.is"}
htmlfiles <- list.files(destdir_provider)
htmlfiles_relpath <- file.path(destdir_provider, htmlfiles)
provider_list <-
  lapply(htmlfiles_relpath, extractFG)
provider_df <- do.call("rbind", provider_list)
knitr::kable(provider_df[1:10,])
```
